title: Mashed Eggplant
steps: Toss the garlic and eggplant in olive oil.
Place the garlic and eggplant on a baking sheet and bake for 17 to 19 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, vinegar, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Add the roasted garlic and eggplant to the yogurt mixture and mash with a fork.
